name: Magic Hat
description:
Absorb magic cards 🃏 to attack back with magic spell 🔥!

Solo 72hours Double jam project (Bullet Hell? jam x Mini Jam 41)

I got way too ambitious this time so I completely failed at making on the asset and content part. No sound, no music, no animations... It's very barebone even for a solo jam but I had a ton of fun making this prototype. 😁

Right Click - Absorb enemy cards
Left Click - Use absorbed cards to throw a magic spell
R - Restart

(IMPORTANT) The player character can die in 3 different ways:
1) Get hit by a card.
2) Absorb too much cards.
3) Mix absorbed cards.
(Make sure to use up all your spells before absorbing a card from another element)
